item.description:
Strollin' on Main Street is a Town of Manchester event with 3 bands: Nifty Fifties in Center Park (Next to the library), The Clams on the St James Church lawn, and No Jive Band in the Forest/Main Street parking lot (where the pony rides will be). Food vendors also will be at these venues.

All the retailers will be open, as well as the restaurants. I suggest that we stroll around, listen to some music, and stop in at one of the restaurants for dinner. Stroll some more and then we can go to Catsup & Mustard (no band) for drinks, or both Main Pub and Hungry Tiger both have bands that night.

We will meet in the parking lot behind 555 Main Street from 5:45 - 6:15 pm. If you come later, call my cell (# to be emailed to "YES" responses the day before) and I'll tell you where to meet us. - Betsy
item.how_to_find_us: I will be in this small parking lot by 5:45pm, my car is a tan Maxima with a roof rack and a MEETUP sign in the front window.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: STROLLIN ON MAIN STREET (MANCHESTER) 06/12/08
